m_szDocTitle: Wonderful New Tesla Fan Commercial | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Wonderful New Tesla Fan Commercial Originally published on EV Obsession . It’s hard to call this the best Tesla fan commercial yet since it doesn’t really highlight any of the Tesla Model S’s awesome features (other than it’s cool look). “ Gallons of Light ” was certainly an awesome commercial that is hard to compete with. But hey, it’s not about competing — it’s about putting one block on top of another to build an awesome electric castle… er, something like that (I have a baby and spend a lot of time playing with blocks). Without any more rambling, though, let’s get to the goods: Tesla – Fir
